headline: The Market Is Vulnerable. 6 ‘Defensive’ Stocks to Buy Now.
summary: FEATURE  The market’s rally brings it to a level that makes it vulnerable to declines. Buying cheap “defensive” stocks is a smart way to protect your portfolio.  Last week, in the Trader Column, we pointed out that defensives, broadly, were a good place to start looking for stocks.
